title: I Can't buy RP
body: My account is in EUNE and I can't buy RP. I have a Visa Gift Card and I put it into PayPal. (It has $30 USD on it). I tried to buy 20 EUR of RP ($22.95) and it just said the card was denied. Can anyone help me? Thanks!

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can assist!  We'll figure out what's causing this purchase issue, and will respond asap!
